Comment: Although Stefanik had been good and supportive in regard to  relations with Canada, she must come to realize the damage and the divide with America  this presidency has created.   This is not simply an economic or logistical issue. Relations can  never be the same once you’ve gone from trusted ally to threatening foe.  You can’t have your cake and eat it too.
